bug.author: QiyuZ
bug.summary: DQNcar in PythonClient is not working (will not converge)
bug.description: There is an example in PythonClient which applies DQN to run the car. However, I ran it for a long time and found it will not converge. Does anyone success?

comments.comment: Not sure about the tutorial on this repo, but you may try ours <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AutonomousDrivingCookbook/tree/master/DistributedRL>here</denchmark-link> .

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/QiyuZ>@QiyuZ</denchmark-link> , thank you for reporting this issue. This script was recently removed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/pull/3215>#3215</denchmark-link> and replaced with a new script at \AirSim\PythonClient\reinforcement_learning\dqn_car.py that uses the new OpenAI gym wrapper. I tested the new script locally and it runs for me. Can you retest with the new script and report back if you see any issues?
